Des_Moines.Central Iowa Shelter:
Central Iowa Shelter and Services (formerly Churches United Shelter) is a homeless shelter located in Des Moines, Iowa. The facility provides food, sleeping arrangements and services to homeless adults regardless of their physical or emotional conditions.


== History ==
The facility was formed in 1992 by eight community churches in response to a number of homeless deaths caused by hypothermia and by crush injuries sustained when occupied dumpsters were emptied into disposal trucks.
